title: You might as well live
creator_credit: Fortian Productions, Con Anemogiannis and Judy Menczel
brief_description: ‘You might as well live’ is an excellent documentary on the subject of youth suicide in Australia. The film examines why Australia has such a high youth suicide rate and what can be done about it.
creator_credit_for_label: Fortian Productions, Con Anemogiannis and Judy Menczel
